abilities.name: Metal Form
abilities.effect: You're made of metal, which makes you immune to many of the normal hazards of the world and grants exceptional toughness.

abilities.name: Metallic Body
abilities.effect:
Your metallic form grants you the following benefits:
* Replace [_Natural_] with [_Metal_] on all your effects.
* Gain +2 _Block_ against _Slash_, _Stab_, and _Crush_ effects.

abilities.name: Heat Conduction
abilities.effect:
This creature has three states: Heated, Normal, and Chilled.
* While _Heated_, the creature has _Weakness_ to _Cold_ and _Water_, and adds _Fire_ to all _Martial_ _Attacks_. While _Chilled_, the creature has _Weakness_ to _Fire_. Whenever the creature takes _Fire_ Damage, move them one step towards Heated. Whenever they take _Cold_ Damage, move them one step towards Chilled. If they take _Water_ Damage, move them one step towards Chilled but not beyond Normal.

abilities.name: Metallic Resonance
abilities.special: Your Spirit may use this on your _Turn_ while not _Summoned_. If they do, they must Target _Equipment_ you have _Worn_ or _Packed_.
abilities.effect: Clear 4 _Stun_.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Healing
enhancements.effect: Instead, clear 4 _Stun_ and gain 3 _Stamina_. If triggering this based on _Equipment_, reduce the _Durability_ of said _Equipment_ by 1.

name: Light Natural Armor
prereqs: Metal, Earth, Wood, or Ice Spirit, and no other [Armored] Traits.

abilities.name: Carapace Armor
abilities.effect: This spirit gains the _Carapace_ Armor.

abilities.name: Threads
abilities.effect: This creature is capable of creating thin threads made of metal that are exceptionally strong and can be fired a short distance. This can be used as rope, thread, or a variety of other potential uses. At GM's discretion, after using too much of this Ability, the creature may be required to rest and recover it as if it was _Fatigue_.

abilities.name: Wire Whip
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within _Range_. You may deal no Damage to reduce the cost of <u>Entangle</u> by 1, but must choose prior to making the Attack.

enhancements.name: Entangle
enhancements.effect: Add _Entangled_ 1 [_Reflex_] on a _Graze_+, or _Entangled_ 2 [_Reflex_] on a _Crit_.

analysis_notes.notes: Gambit worth 2 Momentum, 16% chance for a 10, really only 11% matters because two 5s is already a Gambit

abilities.name: Locust Biology
abilities.effect: You have _Resistance_ [_Poison_].

abilities.name: Natural Climber
abilities.effect: This creature has natural appendages or aptitude for climbing, and can easily climb all but the most sheer or difficult of surfaces.

abilities.name: Climbing
abilities.effect: This creature can bypass many features (such as _Cliffs_) when moving between _Arenas_.

abilities.name: Swiftness
abilities.effect: You are quick on your feet and more nimble than most. In matters of speed, you almost always win.

abilities.name: Improved Mobility
abilities.effect: Gain +1 _Movement_.

abilities.name: Scamper
abilities.effect: At the start of your _Turn_, before any using any other abilities, you may _Retreat_, regardless of what your _Stance_ dictates.

abilities.name: Tiny Size
abilities.effect: You are extremely small, somewhere between the size of a rat and a typical cat, granting you greatly improved agility and speed. Depending on the circumstance, your small size and limited weight may be a boon or bane.

abilities.name: Diminutive Agility
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Tiny_, decreases their _Speed_ by 1, gains a +1 to _Reflex_, and +1 _Movement_. If they already have _Speed_ 1, instead gain an additional +1 _Movement_.

abilities.name: Small Size
abilities.effect: You are small, somewhere between the size of a cat and typical dog, granting you increased agility and speed. Depending on the circumstance, your smaller size may be a boon or bane.

abilities.name: Small Profile
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Small_, gains +2 _Stamina_, +1 _Stun_, and +1 _Reflex_.

abilities.name: Medium Size
abilities.effect: You are somewhere between the size of a typical dog and a human. This size is rarely relevant, but may occasionally may be a boon or bane.

abilities.name: Medium Profile
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Medium_, gains +5 _Stamina_, +3 _Stun_, and +1 _Grit_.

abilities.name: Large Size
abilities.effect: You are somewhere between the size of a human and a horse, granting you increased strength and power. Depending on the circumstance, your large size may be a boon or bane.

abilities.name: Large Profile
abilities.effect: Your Spirit becomes _Large_, gains +10 _Stamina_, +6 _Stun_, and +2 _Grit_.
